results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and others
results.title: BATMAN & ROBIN, VOL. 3
results.author: Grant Morrison and others
results.description: The Joker is back and, having murdered a Robin in the past, he is not against harming the new one.

results.contributor: by Peter J. Tomasi and Patrick Gleason
results.title: BATMAN & ROBIN: BORN TO KILL
results.author: Peter J Tomasi and Patrick Gleason
results.description: It may be the "New 52," but not a lot has changed as Batman (Bruce Wayne) must learn to work with Damian, his son and the latest Robin.

results.contributor: by  Various
results.title: BATMAN & ROBIN: DARK KNIGHT, WHITE KNIGHT
results.author: Various
results.description: The final adventures featuring Dick Grayson as Batman paired with Bruce Wayne's son, Damian, are collected in this volume.

results.contributor: by Paul Dini and Dustin Nguyen
results.title: BATMAN (THE RETURN OF HUSH)
results.author: Paul Dini and Dustin Nguyen

results.contributor: by various
results.title: BATMAN 75TH ANNIVERSARY BOX SET
results.author: various
results.description: A few of the Caped Crusader’s most popular tales are collected here, including “The Dark Knight Returns,” “Batman: Hush” and “Batman: The Court of Owls.”

results.contributor: by James Tynion IV and others
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN ETERNAL, VOL. 2
results.author: James Tynion IV and others
results.description: Batman's current and former allies join forces to thwart the deadly scheme of a human trafficker.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison, Frank Quitely and Philip Tan
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL. 1
results.author: Grant Morrison, Frank Quitely and Philip Tan
results.description: After Batman’s demise, Dick Grayson, the first Robin, takes on the mantle of the Bat. His costumed partner is Damien, the son of Bruce Wayne. Causing them grief? Jason Todd, the second Robin.

results.contributor: by Frank Quitely and Philip Tan
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL. 1: BATMAN REBORN
results.author: Frank Quitely and Philip Tan
results.description: After Batman’s demise, Dick Grayson, the first Robin, takes on the mantle of the Bat. His costumed partner is Damien, the son of Bruce Wayne. Causing them grief? Jason Todd, the second Robin.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison, Andy Clarke and Cameron Stewart
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL. 2
results.author: Grant Morrison, Andy Clarke and Cameron Stewart
results.description: Bruce Wayne is still alive. But who will help him when Robin has turned on Batman? Plus: the identity of Oberon Sexton is revealed. It is not who you think.

results.contributor: by Peter Tomasi and Patrick Gleason
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL. 2
results.author: Peter Tomasi and Patrick Gleason
results.description: The latest Robin sets out to prove himself by battling the former partners of Batman.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and others
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL. 3
results.author: Grant Morrison and others
results.description: Batman (Dick Grayson) and Robin (Damian Wayne) confront the Joker and cope with the return of Bruce Wayne.

results.contributor: by Peter Tomasi and Patrick Gleason
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL. 4
results.author: Peter Tomasi and Patrick Gleason
results.description: Batman’s allies help him cope with the death of his son Damian, the latest Robin.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and others
results.title: BATMAN AND ROBIN, VOL.2
results.author: Grant Morrison and others
results.description: Bruce Wayne is still alive. But who will help him when Robin has turned on Batman? Plus: the identity of Oberon Sexton is revealed. It is not who you think.

results.contributor: by Ryan Benjamin and Adam Beechen
results.title: BATMAN BEYOND: HUSH BEYOND
results.author: Ryan Benjamin and Adam Beechen
results.description: In the future, Bruce Wayne has passed on the mantle of Batman to Terry McGinnis. The new hero now faces a threat with links to the past.

results.contributor: by Neal Adams and Denny O'Neil
results.title: BATMAN BY NEAL ADAMS OMNIBUS
results.author: Neal Adams and Denny O'Neil
results.description: The work of Mr. Adams, who redefined the look of Batman in the 1970s, is collected here.

results.contributor: by John Sazaklis and  Mada Design Staff
results.title: BATMAN CLASSIC: GOTHAM'S VILLAINS UNLEASHED!
results.author: John Sazaklis and  Mada Design Staff
results.description: The Joker orchestrates a breakout in this parent-approved version of the Dark Knight.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and others
results.title: BATMAN ETERNAL, VOL. 2
results.author: Scott Snyder and others
results.description: A string of disasters stretch Batman and his allies to the limit. Can one villain be behind them all?

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and others
results.title: BATMAN ETERNAL, VOL. 3
results.author: Scott Snyder and others
results.description: The true puppet master behind a string of disasters in Gotham City is revealed.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and Yanick Paquette
results.title: BATMAN INCORPORATED DELUXE, VOL. 1
results.author: Grant Morrison and Yanick Paquette
results.description: Bruce Wayne comes out to the world as the financial supporter of Batman — and his intention to go global.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and Chris Burnham
results.title: BATMAN INCORPORATED, VOL. 1
results.author: Grant Morrison and Chris Burnham
results.description: Batman and his allies confront the minions of Leviathan, an organization run by Talia al Ghul, the mother of the caped crusader's son.
